resources.string: Igama ledivayisi yakho liyabonakala kuzinhlelo zokusebenza efonini yakho. Futhi lingabonwa ngabanye abantu uma uxhuma kumadivayisi e-Bluetooth noma usetha i-WLAN hotspot.
Sekela ngokulondoloza idatha yohlelo lokusebenza, amaphasiwedi e-WLAN, nezinye izilungiselelo kwumaseva we-Google
Yeka ukulondoloza amaphasiwedi akho e-WLAN, amabhukhimaki, ezinye izilungiselelo, kanye nedatha yezinhlelo zokusebenza, nokususa onke amakhophi kumaseva we-Google?
Vala i-WLAN uma ungayisebenzisi noma uma ingatholakali
Vumela lolu hlelo lokusebenza ukuthi luvule noma luvale i-WLAN, luskene luphinde lulawule amanethiwekhi e-WLAN, lungeze noma lususe amanethiwekhi, noma luqale i-hotspot yasendaweni kuphela
Vumela uhlelo lokusebenza ukuthi lulawule i-WLAN
Ukuze ukhethe amanethiwekhi akaliwe, vula i-WLAN.
Uma ukhawulele idatha yeselula engemuva, ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi ngeke asebenze ngaphandle kokuthi uxhumeke ku-WLAN.

"Uma ukhawulela idatha yeselula engemuva, ezinye izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi ngeke asebenze ngaphandle kokuthi uxhumeke ku-WLAN.
Lesi silungiselelo sithinta bonke abasebenzisi abakule foni."
Isetshenziswa njengendawo yakho uma wenza ikholi ephuthumayo nge-WLAN

"Yenza isipele ngokuzenzakalela idatha yedivayisi (efana namaphasiwedi we-WLAN nomlando wokushaya) nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza (efana nezilungiselelo namafayela agcinwe yizinhlelo zokusebenza) ngokulawula kude.
Uma uvula isipele ngokuzenzakalela, idivayisi nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza ilondolozwa ngesikhathi ezithile ngesilawuli kude. Idatha yohlelo lokusebenza ingaba yinoma iyiphi idatha elondolozwe wuhlelo lokusebenza (kususelwa kuzilungiselelo zonjiniyela), efaka idatha enekhono lokuzwela njengoxhumana nabo, imilayezo, nezithombe."

Misa ukwenza isipele idatha yedivayisi (njengamaphasiwedi we-WLAN nomlando wekholi) nedatha yohlelo lokusebenza (njengezilungiselelo namafayela alondolozwe izinhlelo zokusebenza), futhi nokusula wonke amakhophi kumaseva werimothi?

Vumela izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi ukuthi askenele amanethiwekhi e-WLAN noma kunini, nanoma i-WLAN ivaliwe. Lokhu kungasetshenziselwa, njengesibonelo, ukuthuthukisa izici ezisuselwa endaweni namasevisi.
Ungashintshela kunethiwekhi yeselula noma kunini lapho i-WLAN inokuxhumeka okungalungile. Izindleko zokusetshenziswa kwedatha zingasebenza.
Hlala ugcine idatha yeselula isebenza, nanoma i-WLAN isebenza (ngokushintshwa kwenethiwekhi okusheshayo).
Phatha i-WLAN, i-Bluetooth, imodi yendiza, amanethiwekhi eselula; nama-VPN
"Ukubhalisa kwe-IMS: %1$s I-Voice over LTE: %2$s I-Voice over WLAN: %3$s Ukushaya kwevidiyo: %4$s UT isixhumi esibonakalayo: %5$s"

"Lokhu kuzosetha kabusha zonke izilungiselelo zenethiwekhi ezifaka:
"
i-WLAN" "
Idatha yeselula" "
ne-Bluetooth
Ukuskena kwe-Bluetooth kuvuliwe, ukuskena kwe-WLAN kuvaliwe
Ukuskena kwe-WLAN kuvuliwe, ukuskena kwe-Bluetooth kuvaliwe

"Manje ungabelana ngale divayisi nabanye abantu ngokudala abasebenzisi abangeziwe. Umsebenzisi ngamunye unesikhala sakhe, angakwazi ukusenza ngendlela ayifisayo ngezinhlelo zokusebenza, isithombe sangemuva, njalo njalo. Abasebenzisi bangalungisa izilungiselelo zedivayisi ezifana ne-WLAN ezithinta wonke umuntu.
Uma ungeza umsebenzisi omusha, loyo muntu kumele asethe isikhala sakhe.
Noma imuphi umsebenzisi angabuyekeza izinhlelo zokusebenza kubo bonke abanye abasebenzisi. Izilungiselelo zokufinyelela kungenzeka zingadluliselwa kumsebenzisi omusha."

"Amakholi aphuthumayo ngokushaya kwe-WLAN awasekelwe inkampani yakho yenethiwekhi. Idivayisi ishintsha ngokuzenzakalela iye kunethiwekhi yeselula ukuze yenze ikholi ephuthumayo. Amakholi aphuthumayo akhonakala kuphela ezindaweni ezinokufakwa kweselula."
Izilungiselelo ezithuthukisiwe ze-WLAN azitholakaleli lo msebenzisi
Khetha okungenani ibhendi eyodwa ye-WLAN hotspot:
Uma inethiwekhi yeselula ingatholakali, sebenzisa i-WLAN
Shaya nge-WLAN. Uma i-WLAN ilahleka, ikholi izophela.
Uma i-WLAN ingatholakali, sebenzisa inethiwekhi yeselula

Uma kuvulwe ukushaya kwe-WLAN, ifoni yakho ingahambisa amakholi ngamanethiwekhi e-WLAN kunethiwekhi yenkampani yakho yenethiwekhi, ngokuya ngokuncamelayo nokuthi iyiphi isignali eqinile. Ngaphambi kokuthi uvule lesi sici, hlola nenkampani yakho yenethiwekhi ngokuphathelene nezinkokhiso kanye neminye imininingwane. %1$s
Vula ukushaya kwe-WLAN ukuze unwebe ukufakwa
Sebenzisa idatha yeselula uma i-WLAN ingenakho ukufinyelela kwe-inthanethi. Ukusetshenziswa kwedatha kungasebenza.
Misa phakathi nendawo ikhodi ye-QR ngaphansi ukuze ungeze idivayisi ku-“%1$s”
Skena le khodi ye-QR ukuze ixhumeke ku-“%1$s”
Misa phakathi nendawo ikhodi ye-QR ngaphansi ukuze uxhumeke ku-“%1$s”
Skena le khodi ye-QR ukuze uxhumeke ku-“%1$s” uphinde wabelane ngephasiwedi
I-WLAN hotspot izovaleka uma kungekho amadivayisi axhunyiwe
Sebenzisa i-hotspot ukudala inethiwekhi ye-WLAN yamanye amadivayisi akho. I-Hotspot inikezela nge-inthanethi isebenzisa uxhumo lwedatha yakho yeselula. Amashaji edatha yeselula angeziwe angasebenza.
Ungasebenzisi inethiwekhi ye-WLAN ngaphandle kokuthi inoxhumano lwe-intanethi olukahle.

"Ukuze uthuthukse ukunemba kwendawo nangezinye izinhloso, uhlelo lokusebenza olungaziwa lufuna ukuvula ukuskena inethiwekhi, ngisho noma i-WLAN ivaliwe.
Vumela lokhu kuzo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza ezifuna ukuskena?"

"Ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukufaneleka kwendawo nezinye izinjongo, i-%1$s ifuna ukuvula ukuskena kwenethiwekhi, noma ngabe i-WLAN ivaliwe.
Vumela lokhu ngazo zonke izinhlelo zokusebenza ezifuna ukuskena?"

Ukuze kuthuthukiswe ukunemba kwendawo, izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi asengaskenela amanethiwekhi e-WLAN noma kunini, nanoma i-WLAN ivaliwe. Lokhu kungasetshenziselwa, njengesibonelo, ukuthuthukisa izici ezisuselwa endaweni namasevisi. Ungashintsha lokhu LINK_BEGINekuskeneni izilungiseleloLINK_END.
Ukuze uthuthukise ukunemba kwendawo, vula ukuskena kwe-WLAN LINK_BEGINkuzilungiselelo zokuskenaLINK_END.

Ukuskena kwe-WLAN kuvumela izinhlelo zokusebenza namasevisi ukuthi askenele amanethiwekhi e-WLAN noma kunini, nanoma i-WLAN ivaliwe. Lokhu kungasetshenziswa, njengesibonelo, ukuze kuthuthukiswe izici ezisuselwa endaweni namasevisi.
Ukuze uvule i-WLAN ngokuzenzakalelayo, kokuqala udinga ukuvula ukuskena kwe-WLAN.
Nciphisa ukusetshenziswa kwebhethri uma i-WLAN ivuliwe
Shintshela kudatha yeselula uma i-WLAN ilahlekelwa ukufinyelela kwe-inthanethi.
khuphula izinga lokungena le-WLAN, bonisa nge-SSID RSSI engayodwana kusikhethi se-WLAN
I-WLAN izovuleka eceleni kwamanethiwekhi alondolozwe ngekhwalithi ephezulu, njengenethiwekhi yakho yasekhaya
